{{Content bundle |Vendor=Ontoprise |Version=131 |rationale=This content bundle features a set of basic elements that are necessary to for the Collaboration extension. |Installation=extensions/Collaboration |Dependency=smwhalo;153;153, applicationprogramming;103;103 }} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} [[Vendor::Ontoprise| ]] [[Ontology version::131| ]] [[Installation dir::extensions/Collaboration| ]] [[Dependency::smwhalo;153;153| ]] [[Dependency::applicationprogramming;103;103| ]] ;This content bundle features a set of basic elements that are necessary to for the Collaboration extension. Simply add the template call {{ShowComments|show=True}} to the area where you would like to display the list of actual comments for this article and the collapsible comment form. Usually this is at the bottom of the page. We have created a small [[Collaboration_Sandbox|Collaboration Sandbox]] for this extension where you discover its features. More information about the Collaboration extension and how to use it can be found in our [http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Collaboration_Extension Collaboration extension help article at SMWForum]. ;This bundle contains these articles : {{#ask:[[Part of bundle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] |?=Link |?Rationale |link=subject |default=''none'' |mainlabel=- }} [[Category:Content bundle|Content_bundle]] {{Content hash|value=a5b59c7c93de4673e7a007ab705bdafa}}
